Job Title: Power Electronics System and Controls Engineer

Location: Pompano Beach, FL

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Engineering, Information Technology

Description:
Job Description SummaryThe Power Electronics System and Controls Engineer provides consultation and technical direction to the team developing state-of-the art power conversion products. The activities include contributing to the design, development, troubleshooting, and verification of open and closed loop control systems for products and systems for the Aviation power industry. In this role, you will be responsible for performing engineering work and applied research in the development for next ****** military aircraft and ground vehicles.

Job Description

Essential Responsibilities

Responsible for developing and implementing system control model using hardware and software techniquesWork with project stakeholders to understand the project requirements and translate them to system control requirements for the projectWork on developing system topologies that meets the requirements for the projectCreate or re-use a control model that is that is appropriate for the projectWork on optimizing and tuning the control modelWork on algorithm partitioning with system, software, and hardware engineersCollaborate with software, and hardware engineers to help them convert the control model into the codeCollaborate with engineers to help them integrate the control model into systemSimulate and model closed loop systems using MATLAB / Simulink / PLECS or equivalent simulation tools to support design and proposal efforts

Qualifications / Requirements

Bachelor of Science in Electrical Engineering or from an accredited university or collegeA minimum of 5 years of experience in an engineering position

Desired Characteristics

Master's Degree or PhD in Electrical Engineering from an accredited university or college or equivalent experienceProficiency with MATLAB / Simulink / PLECS or equivalent simulation toolsDesign experience with large power supplies or frequency convertersDesign experience using high performance digital control techniques for power convertersPrevious experience within the field of power electronics controls and applications, with a focus on avionics or military applicationsStrong oral and written communication skillsStrong interpersonal and leadership skills

The salary range for this position is 94,500 – 157,500 USD Annual. The specific salary offered to a candidate may be influenced by a variety of factors including the candidate’s experience, their education, and the work location. In addition, this position is eligible for a performance bonus/variable incentive plan.

GE provides a comprehensive benefits pack****** that provides access to plans which support the overall wellbeing of our employees and their dependents. These benefits include, but are not limited to, health care cover****** (medical, dental, vision, pharmacy), a retirement plan that includes Company Retirement Savings and a 401K with Company matching, Life Insurance options, ****** cover******, paid time-off, EAP, and more.

This role is restricted to U.S. persons (i.e., U.S. ******s, permanent ******s, and other protected individuals under the Immigration and Naturalization Act, 8 U.S.C. 1324b(a)(3)) due to access to export-controlled technology. GE will require proof of status prior to employment.

This role requires access to U.S. export-controlled information. If applicable, final offers will be contingent on ability to obtain authorization for access to U.S. export-controlled information from the U.S. Government.

Additional Information

GE offers a great work environment, professional development, challenging careers, and competitive compensation. GE is an Equal Opportunity Employer. Employment decisions are made without regard to ******, ******, ******, ****** or ****** ******, ******, ******ual ******, ****** ****** or expression, ******, ******, protected veteran status or other characteristics protected by law.

GE will only employ those who are legally authorized to work in the United States for this opening. Any offer of employment is conditioned upon the successful completion of a drug screen (as applicable).

Relocation Assistance Provided: Yes

Experience Level (if available): Entry level
